documents.title: famous jane austen portrait comes to winchester
text: one of the most famous images of jane austen is to go on display in winchester , where she is buried , to mark the 200th anniversary of the author 's death .
the watercolour , by james andrews , was bought by a private collector , believed to live in the united states , at a london auction in 2013 .
the portrait , which also appears on the new £ 10 note , will go on show at winchester discovery centre from 13 may - 24 july .

documents.title: weather outlook : dry and sunny
text: it 'll be mostly dry overnight with variable amounts of cloud , and just the small chance of an isolated light shower .
tomorrow will be mostly dry with sunny spells .
it 'll feeling quite warm by afternoon but will become breezier later .
check out the full bank holiday forecast here on the bbc weather site .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: british sailing : mark robinson named new olympic performance manager
text: british sailing have named mark robinson as their new olympic performance manager .
robinson , 42 , will start in june after holding a similar post with australia .
he succeeds stephen park , now performance director with british cyclingand will lead the bid for medals at the 2020 tokyo games .
`` i feel immensely privileged to be given the opportunity to lead such a successful team into tokyo 2020 and beyond , '' robinson said .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: council expands property portfolio
text: portsmouth city council has agreed to buy a new retail park which it said could generate up to £ 1m a year .
the construction of portsmouth retail park in north harbour is expected to be completed next spring , the authority said .
the purchase is part of a council strategy to invest in commercial property across england to raise income .
the authority said its 10 commercial assets currently generated a profit of £ 4.3m a year .

documents.title: howe wants to break 40-point mark this weekend
text: bournemouth boss eddie howe is n't taking anything for granted despite his side being seven points clear of the drop on 38 points , while sunderland are stranded 12 points from safety .
i wo n't accept we 're safe until it 's mathematically done .
we 'd love to get over the 40 point barrier this weekend though .
any away game in the premier league is difficult .
while there 's hope for sunderland they 'll keep going , it will be tough .
we 've been slightly more inconsistent than we 'd have liked , but i see progression in the team and we 're going the right way .
author: BBC Sport

text: blandford georgian fayre - which includes stalls and exhibitions - has been held on the first bank holiday monday in may for more than 24 years .
it attracts more than 30,000 people and raises cash for local charities .
blandford georgian fayre - monday 1 may - various roads in the town closed 5am - 7pm .

documents.title: asda delivery van 'stolen ' in bournemouth
text: officers are appealing for information after it was reported an asda delivery van was stolen in bournemouth .
the driver of the van reported it was taken while he was making deliveries in wellington road ( at about 18:30 on wednesday , dorset police said .
the driver was informed by a member of the public that the van had been seen heading in the direction of holdenhurst road .
it was later recovered in the totton area of hampshire .
a 50-year-old man , of no fixed address , was arrested on sus of theft and driving offences and has since been released under investigation .

documents.title: appeal to trace next of kin
text: an appeal has been made to help trace the next of kin of a man from ipswich .
paul backhouse , who resided at an address in emmanuel close , died on 17 april , at the age of 68 .
there were no sus circumstances .
officers would like to trace anyone who may have known mr backhouse .
it is believed he had links locally , in portsmouth and overseas in america .

documents.title: pedestrian dies after being hit by car in bournemouth
text: a pedestrian who was hit by a car in bournemouth on wednesday has died of her injuries .
the 87-year-old woman was stuck in southbourne road ( at about 11:45 bst .
she suffered serious injuries to her legs and head and was taken to hospital , where she has since died of her injuries .
officers are appealing for witnesses .

documents.title: bournemouth : howe 'really pleased ' with boruc extension
text: eddie howe said he is `` really pleased '' artur boruc has extended his contract through to summer 2018 .
`` he 's been so consistent for us and in really good form , '' he said , adding : `` he 's won us points this season . ''
but do n't expect howe to be distracted by the big fight on saturday night at wembley between anthony joshua and wladimir klitschko .
`` i 'm not a boxing fan , it 's one sport i do n't follow .
i do appreciate and respect the training , but the focus is on us , '' he added .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: milestone reached for great western railway 's new train fleet
text: the new fleet of intercity express trains for the great western railway ( gwr ) line from london to the south west has reached a new milestone , the firm has said .
the route will link paddington to exeter and cornwall via reading and newbury .
the first five-car test train left japan for the uk on wednesday and is expected to reach southampton port in june , gwr said .
the class 802 fleet is currently being built in pistoia , italy , and due to enter passenger service next summer .
in total , three test trains will be used ahead of the trains entering service .
the class 800 fleet , built at newton aycliffe , county durham , is currently being tested in the uk and due to enter service later this year .

documents.title: bournemouth stabbing : man 'critical but stable '
text: the condition of a man who was stabbed in a bournemouth alleyway on thursday is described as critical but stable , dorset police has said .
the force added no arrests had been made .
the man , in his 40s and from bournemouth , was discovered with stab wounds on a path linking manor road and east overcliffe drive at 11:40 bst on thursday .

documents.title: 'thousands of warning letters sent ' as result of speedwatch scheme
text: a crackdown on speeding drivers in dorset has been relaunched by police .
the force is handing out special equipment to volunteers to record those exceeding speed limits through the county 's towns and villages as part of the community speedwatch scheme .
crackdown by @ twitterid on speeding drivers - community speedwatch action has seen 17,500 warning letters sent since # dorset launch 2013

documents.title: southern house price increases 'slowing '
text: property values across parts of the south , including london , have slowed to the weakest rates in five years , a new survey has shown .

hometrack , which tracks house price movements across the uk 's 20 biggest cities and towns , said the dynamics of the housing market were shifting , as cities which had been driving price growth , were now seeing a significant slowdown .
portsmouth , bournemouth and southampton are still showing growth of more than 6 % .
here are the average house prices in march across the cities covered by hometrack 's index , with the annual change
buyers outside the south of england appear to be shrugging off concerns over brexit and a squeeze on real incomes to take advantage of low mortgage rates .
this is shifting the dynamics of the housing market .

documents.title: car-fest south line-up announced
text: deacon blue , busted and rick astley are among the stars performing at this year 's car-fest in aid of bbc children in need .
tickets are still available for the three-day event at laverstoke farm in hampshire over the august bank holiday weekend .
its as 'easy as 1,2,3 ' @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid at carfest south .
get 3 day tix : # carfest2017

documents.title: bournemouth man found with stab wounds in alleyway
text: a man is in a life-threatening condition after being found stabbed in an alleyway in bournemouth .
the man , in his 40s and from bournemouth , was discovered with stab wounds on a path linking manor road and east overcliff drive at 11:40 bst on thursday .
dorset police said he was taken to hospital where his injuries are described as `` potentially life-threatening '' .
detectives are appealing for information .
